name: Blind date - A short yuri visual novel
name_original: Blind date - A short yuri visual novel
description: University holidays are soon and Flynn doesn't know what to do with herself. To keep her company during these holidays, he best friend - Hazel - sets her up on a blind date that she cannot refuse or escape. But there's one big problem: Flynn has terrible social skills. How will Flynn go on her blind date? That's up to you.
